23,045(10) =? (2)

23(10)=?(2)
23/2=11 a0=1
11/2=5 a1=1
5/2=2 a2=1
2/2=1 a3=0
1/2=0 a4=1
23(10)=10111(2)

0,045(10)=?(2)
0,045*2=0,09 a[-1]=0
0,09*2=0,18 a[-2]=0
0,18*2=0,36 a[-3]=0
0,36*2=0,72 a[-4] =0
0,72*2=1,44 a[-5]=1
0,045(10)=0,0001(2)

23,045(10)=10111,0001(2)

128,5(10)=?(2)

128(10)=?(2)						  
128/2=64 a0=0						  
64/2=32 a1=0						
32/2=16 a2=0
16/2=8 a3=0
8/2=4 a4=0
4/2=2 a5=0
2/2=1 a6=0
1/2=0 a7=1
128(10) = 10000000(2)

0,5(10)=?(2)
0,5*2=1,0 a[-1]=1

128,5(10)=10000000,1

107,625(10)=?(2)

107(10)=?(2)
107/2=53 a0=1
53/2=26 a1=1
26/2=13 a2=0
13/2=6 a3=1
6/2=3 a4=0
3/2=1 a5=1
1/2=0 a6=1
107(10)=1101011(2)

0,625(10)=?(2)
0,625*2=1,25 a[-1]=1

107,625(10)=1101011,1(2)

34,724(10)=?(2)

34(10)=?(2)
34/2=17 a0=0
17/2=8 a1=1
8/2=4 a2=0
4/2=2 a3=0
2/2=1 a4=0
1/2=0 a5=1
34(10)=100010(2)

0,724(10)=?(2)
0,724*2=1,448 a[-1]=1

34,724(10)=100010,1(2)
